menu.confirmCloseAppMessage: Are you sure you want to exit the application?

search.title: Search Music
search.noAlbums: No albums found for this artist

archives.title: Archived Albums
archives.subtitle: Your music collection
archives.noTracks: No tracks found for this album
archives.urlChanged: URL changed - Song will be re-archived
archives.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this album? All archived files will be permanently removed from your computer.
archives.confirmDeleteSongMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this song file? The file will be permanently removed from your computer.
archives.deleteSongHint: You can re-archive or upload a new file after deletion
archives.confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset this album? All archived files and video URLs will be removed, and the album will be queued for re-archiving.

empty.title: No archived albums yet
empty.message: Search for albums and archive them to see them here

about.title: Personal Music Archiver
about.description: A research application designed to simplify archiving albums from YouTube and other streaming services.

features.title: Features:
features.track: Track archive status and organize your collection
features.manage: Manage artists, albums, and songs in a local database

about.license: This project is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.

videoUrl.title: Add Video URL
videoUrl.label: Video URL
videoUrl.hint: Enter the video URL for this song (YouTube, Vimeo, etc.)

fileUpload.title: Upload MP3 File
fileUpload.dropText: Drag and drop your MP3 file here

archive_status_tooltip.not_archived: Album not archived yet - queued for archiving

error.album_delete_partial: Some files could not be deleted
error.missing_dependency: {0} is not installed or not accessible. Please install it to enable archiving.
error.missing_dependencies_multiple: Missing dependencies: {0}. Please install them to enable archiving.
error.no_active_plugin: No archive plugin is active. Please install and activate a plugin.
error.plugin_dependencies_missing: Plugin dependencies missing. Please install required tools.

plugins.title: Archive Plugin
plugins.description: Manage archive plugin for music collection
plugins.author: Author
plugins.installHint: Click 'Upload Plugin' to install a new plugin
plugins.step1: Create a plugin file (compiled JavaScript implementing IDownloadPlugin)
plugins.confirmDeleteMessage: This plugin will be permanently removed from your system.
plugins.confirmActivateMessage: This plugin will be activated and set as the active download source. Any currently active plugin will be deactivated.
plugins.confirmDeactivateMessage: This plugin will be deactivated and you will need to activate a different plugin to continue archiving.
plugins.uploadBlockedMessage: You already have a custom plugin installed. Please delete the existing custom plugin before uploading a new one.
plugins.uploadBlockedHint: Only one custom plugin can be installed at a time
plugins.uploadDisabledHint: Only one custom plugin can be installed at a time

errors.missing_dependency: {0} is not installed or not accessible. Please install it to enable archiving.
errors.missing_dependencies_multiple: Missing dependencies: {0}. Please install them to enable archiving.
errors.no_active_plugin: No archive plugin is active. Please install and activate a plugin.
errors.plugin_dependencies_missing: Plugin dependencies missing. Please install required tools.
